title: Aarya Kundan Petal Stud Earrings - Elegant Karnaphool Design
materials: Natural Kundan Polki Diamonds. Features traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting for a rich
authentic look. Gold Weight: 2.150 grams; Net Weight: 7.97 grams.
features: Intricate petal design with a central cluster of Kundan Polki diamonds. The earrings feature a classic button design, reminiscent of traditional Karnaphool earrings. The Kundan setting is meticulously handcrafted, showcasing the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making. The floral motif adds a touch of femininity and grace.
occasions: and traditional celebrations. These earrings are also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern formal events. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: Crafted with authentic Hyderabadi Kundan setting, these earrings represent a timeless piece of South Indian heritage. The use of natural Kundan Polki diamonds ensures lasting brilliance and value. The traditional design makes these earrings a meaningful heirloom piece, while the modern button style ensures they can be worn with contemporary outfits as well. Durable and expertly crafted.
